executive chairman,`` a lot of my time'' will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said.`` We've got very complicated government issues,'' he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. Eric Schmidt was an early backer of Barack Obama and according to NewsMeat, has given more than$ 230,000 in campaign donations to Democrats, compared with less than$ 20,000 to Republicans. There is a political favor to be returned yet, said Roger Kay, George W. Bush of Endpoint Technologies. Eric Schmidt 's fundraising ability would also be a pro for Team Barack Obama , which is going to need big money to finance the 2012 reelection campaign.
